content: wait this pattern is available for free on my youtube https //youtu be/oet3ewfm2ga this listing is for people who would prefer a written pattern with plenty of photos or for those who would like to support me more directly as a creator if you purchase this pattern thank you so much for choosing to support me as a designer you re helping me create more free patterns over on youtube pattern details this trapinch works up nice and quickly and is beginner friendly as only 3 stitches are needed single_crochet increase decrease also basic knowledge of embroidery is needed for the details - however the eyes can be made of felt and glue or needle felting instead of the crochet eyes that i used i used 4mm yarn and a 4mm hook trapinch would love to accompany someone outside while playing pokemon go and may even become a lucky mascot when it comes to raids so why not make one for yourself or a friend or family member stitches used single_crochet increase decrease i do not own this character trapinch belongs to nintendo you do have permissions to sell the finished product of this pattern as long as credit is given bluefoxpaws
